articles.title: One dead, 7 injured in Oklahoma festival shooting
articles.description: Authorities said one person was killed and seven were injured in a shooting early Sunday at an outdoor festival in eastern Oklahoma, with a witness describing frantic people running for cover as the gunfire erupted. Two juveniles were among those shot at the …

articles.description: PM Narendra Modi will release benefits under the ‘PM CARES for Children’ on Monday via video-conferencing, the ministry of women and child development said. The PM will transfer scholarships to school-going children, the ministry said in a statement. A PM CAR…

articles.description: IPL 2022 Final Amit Shah Photo Viral: गुजरात टाइटंस और राजस्थान रॉयल्स के बीच खेले गए खिताबी मुकाबले को देखने के लिए गृहमंत्री अमित शाह भी स्टेडिय पहुंचे थे। उनके साथ उनकी वाइफ सोनल भी थीं।

articles.author: Christin Mathew Philip
articles.title: Gig delivery workers drive EV revolution in B'luru
articles.description: Gig delivery workers appear to be driving the electric vehicle (EV) revolution in the city. For the past two years, a significant number of workers in Bengaluru have switched to EVs, thanks to app-based e-mobility rental firms.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Monsoon to enter Karnataka on June 2
articles.description: Monsoon, which entered Kerala on Sunday, is set to arrive in the state on June 2 with heavy rainfall expected in coastal and south interior parts of Karnataka.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Kuvempu row: K'taka CM Bommai says he’ll speak to edu min
articles.description: Chief minister Basavaraj Bommai, on Sunday, said he has taken serious note of Adichunchanagiri Mutt seer Nirmalananda Nath Swamiji’s letter regarding the row over Rashtrakavi Kuvempu, and that he hopes to resolve it soon.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: 375 fresh Covid cases in city, state hits 3-month high at 550
articles.description: The daily tally of Covid cases in the state hit a three-month high on Sunday with 550 fresh cases reported, also its fourth consecutive day of over 500 cases in a day. Mumbai too clocked 375 fresh cases, a 14% rise in new detections over Saturday.

articles.author: Swati Deshpande
articles.title: Invoke NDPS to act against ‘wrongful’ arrests: Lawyers
articles.description: After NCB's SIT questioned the arrest of actor Shah Rukh Khan's son Aryan, legal experts say it is time to invoke provisions under the NDPS Act meant to safeguard against "vexatious arrests" and punish officers who effected the arrest.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: 8 from Bidar on way to Ayodhya killed in accident
articles.description: Eight members of a family from Bidar, including three women, were killed and as many injured after a Tempo Traveller in which they were travelling collided with a truck in Uttar Pradesh’s Bahraich district around 5.30am Sunday.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: B'luru: Two senior citizens held for murdering labourer
articles.description: Two senior citizens have been arrested on charges of murdering a 45-year-old construction worker. Police arrested the duo within hours of them finding the body Ashwath, the victim, at 3pm on Saturday.
